title: Men's Health Magazine typefaces!!! MYSTERY UNSOLVED!
content:
I have tried to figure out the typefaces Men's Health magazine's been using for their logo and feature articles. I want to say they are both customized typefaces, but I desperately want someone to either identify it or show me something that is closest to it.

Please help me solve this mystery. It has been bothering me!

[http://savetheoc.files.wordpress.com/2008/11/cam-gigandet-mens-health-de...](http://web.archive.org/web/20110509070759/http:/savetheoc.files.wordpress.com/2008/11/cam-gigandet-mens-health-december-2008-02.jpg "http://savetheoc.files.wordpress.com/2008/11/cam-gigandet-mens-health-december-2008-02.jpg")
author: szhang1228

comments.content: [Heroun Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20110509070759/http:/fontbureau.com/fonts/HerounSans) by Cyrus Highsmith was designed custom for Men's Health.
